Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "You've been coming home early recently, Morian.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "Your brother's doing a great job, finishing his work early. That's why he's home early to spend more time with you, Murray.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "A mechanical engineer... and working for a big company! Morian, you're amazing! And you look so cool in this outfit as well! I wonder if I'll get to be like you someday...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "...That day will come. You'll be even cooler and more awesome than me, kid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I'm... fine... Morian... Please don't be mad at me..."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "But I've been sneaking out... these past few days and... I spent all the money... I've been saving..."}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "This... can't be it... Oh, Murray, you know damn well...!"}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I... didn't really know... which chip you... cough...n-needed..."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'But this one... this one... looked the best...'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: '...Yes, this is the chip I needed, Murray. Exactly the one. Great job.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "When I can't be by your side... Then the little robot... can stand in for me... with its new chip... and stay with you, brother..."}
